commentaire:
01. When we first stumbled upon this flat on AirBnB, it seemed almost too good to be true. There must be a
catch! But everything was as perfect as it seemed online. (Host Name) is the most thoughtful, gracious host.

He provided us with all the information we needed and showed us around. The flat is just perfect! Kitchen is
compact and contains everything one needs.
